info.author: Radomir Dopieralski
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
info.description: You want Windows users to be able to play your game without installing anything, but you don't want to waste time with Py2Exe? This is something for you! Python and PyGame bundled in a compiled binary executable, just add your game files (possibly in a single convenient ZIP file), and let them play.
info.name: pyg.exe
info.html_description: You want Windows users to be able to play your game without installing anything, but you don’t want to waste time with Py2Exe? This is something for you! Python and PyGame bundled in a compiled binary executable, just add your game files (possibly in a single convenient ZIP file), and let them play.
